rows.label: tlk43100143_01_tlk0001
rows.name:
I hope I get to go up
that tower one day.

rows.label: tlk43100143_01_tlk0002
rows.name:
Maybe I can if I can become a
Driver, like my dad. Yeah, maybe
if I resonate with a Wind Blade...

rows.label: tlk43100143_01_tlk0003
rows.name:
But, I heard you also nead
some special skill called
Leaping or something...

rows.label: tlk43100143_01_tlk0004
rows.name:
I wonder if there's a Blade
that can do that... I'm sure
I've never seen one though!

rows.label: tlk43100143_01_tlk0005
rows.name:
Maybe if I resonate with
a whole bunch of Blades,
I'll find one someday.

rows.label: tlk43100143_01_tlk0006
rows.name:
I bet I'd need a strong
heart to get myself a great
Blade like that, though.
